00031 void
00032 ears::Model1::init()
00033 {
00034   LOG( logINFO ) << "Initializing Model 1";
00035   LOG( logDEBUG ) << "version 1.05 (last mod. 2010-01-18)";
00036   
00037   // smoothing 
00038   initSmoothing();
00039   
00040   init_ = true;
00041 }

00043 
00044 
00046 void
00047 ears::Model1::setSmoothingAuto()
00048 {
00049   double sum_ne = 0.0;
00050   int entityNum = 0;
00051   int progress = 0;
00052   int lastProgress = 0;
00053   for ( ID_T entityID = 0; entityID < entities_.entityNum(); entityID++ ) {    
00054     // indicate progress    
00055     progress = 100 * ( entityID + 1 ) / entities_.entityNum();
00056     if ( progress % 10 == 0 && progress > lastProgress ) {
00057       LOG( logDEBUG ) << progress << "% completed";
00058       lastProgress = progress;
00059     }
00060     // we ignore entities without any associated documents
00061     if ( entities_.entityDocNum( entityID ) > 0 ) {
00062       double ne = 0.0;
00063       const DISTR_T& pde = entities_.entityDocs( entityID );
00064       
00065       // n(e) = \sum_d (n(d) * p(d|e))
00066       for ( DISTR_T::const_iterator it=pde.begin(); it != pde.end(); it++ ) 
00067         ne += (double) index_.docLength( it->first ) * it->second;
00068       
00069       sum_ne += ne;
00070       entityNum++;
00071     }
00072   }
00073   
00074   // smoothingParam_ holds Dirichlet's beta, where \beta = (\sum_e n(e)) / |e|
00075   smoothingParam_ = (double) sum_ne / entityNum;  
00076 }
00077 
00078 
00079 
00081 ears::ASSOCRES_T
00082 ears::Model1::scoreAll()
00083 {
00084   ASSOCRES_T pqe_all;
00085   double lambda = smoothingParam_; // for J-M smoothing
00086   double beta = smoothingParam_; // for Dirichlet smoothing
00087   int entityNum = entities_.entityNum();
00088   int queryNum = queries_.queryNum();
00089   
00090   if ( !init_ ) {
00091     LOG( logERROR ) << "Model needs to be initialized first";
00092     exit( EXIT_FAILURE );                
00093   }
00094     
00095   LOG( logINFO ) << "Calculating topic-entity associations";
00096 
00097   LOG( logDEBUG ) << "Constructing collection Language Model";
00098   lemur::langmod::DocUnigramCounter* collCounter 
00099     = new lemur::langmod::DocUnigramCounter( index_ ); 
00100   lemur::langmod::UnigramLM *collModel 
00101     = new lemur::langmod::MLUnigramLM( *collCounter, index_.termLexiconID() );
00102   
00103   // caching
00104   LOG( logDEBUG ) << "Caching collection probabilities"; 
00105 
00106   // store p(t) for all query terms in a map
00107   std::map< lemur::api::TERMID_T, double > pt_cache;
00108   for ( ID_T qID = 0; qID < queryNum; qID++ ) {
00109     const DISTR_T& ptq = queries_.query( qID );
00110     for ( DISTR_T::const_iterator term_it = ptq.begin();
00111          term_it != ptq.end(); term_it++ ) {
00112       
00113       const lemur::api::TERMID_T& termID = term_it->first; // t
00114       pt_cache[termID] = collModel->prob( termID ); // p(t)
00115       stat_.incOpCount( "P(t)" );
00116     }
00117   }
00118   
00119   // +++
00120   // calculate p(q|e) for all entities and queries
00121   // +++ 
00122   for ( ID_T entityID = 0; entityID < entityNum; entityID++ ) {
00123     LOG( logDEBUG ) << "Entity #" << (entityID+1) << "/" << entityNum
00124       << " (" << entities_.entityID( entityID ) << ")";
00125     
00126     std::vector< double > pqe; // p(q|e) for entity e
00127     pqe.resize( queryNum, 0.0 );
00128     
00129     // build entity language model
00130     int entityDocNum = entities_.entityDocNum( entityID );
00131     stat_.incOpCount( "entityDocNum" );
00132     
00133     if ( entityDocNum > 0 ) {
00134       LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "Creating model based on " 
00135         << entityDocNum << " associated documents";
00136       
00137       ears::DoubleDocUnigramCounter* entityCounter 
00138         = this->entityCounter( entityID );
00139       double ne = (double) entityCounter->sum(); // n(e)
00140       
00141       LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "Scoring queries";
00142       for ( ID_T qID = 0; qID < queryNum; qID++ ) {
00143         LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "  Query #" << (qID+1) << "/" << queryNum
00144           << " ('" << queries_.queryID( qID ) << "')";
00145 
00146         double score = 0.0;
00147         const DISTR_T& q = queries_.query( qID ); // q
00148         
00149         LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "    log p(q|e) = ";
00150 
00151         for ( DISTR_T::const_iterator term_it = q.begin();
00152              term_it != q.end(); term_it++ ) {
00153           
00154           const lemur::api::TERMID_T& termID = term_it->first; // t
00155           const double& ptq = term_it->second; // p(t|q)
00156           double& pt = pt_cache[termID]; // p(t)                    
00157           double nte = entityCounter->count( termID ); // n(t,e)
00158           stat_.incOpCount( "n(t,e)" );
00159 
00160           double pte; // p(t|\theta_e)                    
00161           // Jelinek-Mercer smoothing
00162           // p(t|\theta_e) = (1-\lambda) * (n(t,e)/n(e)) + \lambda * p(t)
00163           if ( smoothingMethod_ == "jm" ) 
00164             pte = (double) (1.0 - lambda) * (nte / ne) + lambda * pt;           
00165           // Dirichlet smoothing
00166           // p(t|\theta_e) = (n(t,e) + \beta * p(t)) / (n(e) + \beta)
00167           if ( smoothingMethod_ == "dirichlet" ) 
00168             pte = ((double) nte + beta * pt) / ((double) ne + beta);
00169           
00170           // log p(q|e) += p(t|q) * log ( p(t|\theta_e) )
00171           score += ptq * log( pte );
00172           
00173           LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "      + p('" << index_.term( termID ) << "'|q) "
00174             << "[" << ptq << "] * log( p(t|e) [" << pte << "] )";
00175           
00176         } // query term t (termID)
00177         
00178         // record p(q|e)
00179         pqe[qID] = exp( score );
00180         
00181         LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "      = " << score;
00182         LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "    p(q|e) = " << pqe[qID];
00183         
00184       } // query q (qID)
00185 
00186       delete entityCounter;
00187     }
00188     // no associated documents -- entity scores 0 on all queries
00189     else {      
00190       LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "No associated documents";
00191     }
00192     
00193     // record scores
00194     pqe_all.push_back( pqe );    
00195     
00196   } // entity e (entityID)
00197   
00198   delete collCounter;
00199   delete collModel;
00200   
00201   LOG( logINFO ) << "Model 1 completed";
00202 
00203   return pqe_all;
00204 }
00205 
00206 
00207 
00209 ears::DoubleDocUnigramCounter* 
00210 ears::Model1::entityCounter( const ID_T& entityID )
00211 {
00212   lemur::api::IndexedRealVector irv;
00213   const DISTR_T& pde = entities_.entityDocs( entityID );
00214   stat_.incOpCount( "entityDocs" );
00215 
00216   // consider all documents associated with the entity
00217   for ( DISTR_T::const_iterator it = pde.begin(); it != pde.end(); it++ ) {
00218     irv.PushValue( it->first, it->second );
00219     stat_.incOpCount( "termInfoList" );
00220     
00221     // only if you want detailed statistics -- note that it slows down computation
00222     if ( DETAILED_STAT == 1 ) {
00223       lemur::api::TermInfoList* termInfoList = index_.termInfoList( it->first );
00224       stat_.incOpCount( "n(t,d)", termInfoList->size() );      
00225       delete termInfoList;
00226     }
00227   }
00228   
00229   lemur::api::PseudoFBDocs* entityDocs = 
00230     new lemur::api::PseudoFBDocs( irv, -1, false );
00231   
00232   ears::DoubleDocUnigramCounter* counter
00233     = new ears::DoubleDocUnigramCounter( *entityDocs, index_ );
00234   
00235   irv.clear();
00236   delete entityDocs;
00237   
00238   return counter;
00239 }
